column4: hello, im having some difficulties with my sound on HP 6735s laptop, im using ubuntu 9.04 Jaunty
i added options snd-hda-intel model=laptop and sound works perfectly on speakers / headphones, but whenever i connect the headphones.. the sound from the speakers doesnt stop.
any idea how to make the sound from the speakers stop whenever i connect my headphones?
if thats the case in many laptops etc the main volume is labelled "front", so you can mute that and the headset still works
